meanings.definition: A compound found in certain pigments and biological substances.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pterin under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The pterin gave the butterfly its vibrant color.
meanings.sent3: The pterin and the pigment had a colorful conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a pterin-filled masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The pterin sparkled like a tiny gem in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of organic compounds containing a pteridine ring.
meanings.sent1: The pterin structure was complex yet fascinating.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a new type of pterin in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The pterin ring danced around the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a pterin-filled puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The pterin ring glowed like a halo in the chemical mixture.
